commands.description: Enables the spawning of recyclers at the target monument. Replace '[monument_name]' with the relevant monument identifier.
Disables the recycler spawn at the given monument. Replace '[monument_name]' with the relevant monument identifier.
Returns a list of the possible configurations for recycler spawns at monuments. This command is intended for use in the server console.
Returns a list of the enabled configurations active on the current server for recycler spawns at monuments. This command is intended for use in the server console.

monumentConfigurations.name: dome_recycler
monumentConfigurations.description: Enables the spawning of recyclers at the Dome.

monumentConfigurations.name: fishing_village_large_recycler
monumentConfigurations.description: Enables the spawning of recyclers at the Large Fishing Village.

monumentConfigurations.name: fishing_village_small_recycler
monumentConfigurations.description: Enables the spawning of recyclers at the Small Fishing Village.

monumentConfigurations.name: oilrig_large_recycler
monumentConfigurations.description: Enables the spawning of recyclers at the Large Oil Rig.

monumentConfigurations.name: oilrig_small_recycler
monumentConfigurations.description: Enables the spawning of recyclers at the Small Oil Rig.

monumentConfigurations.name: stables_recycler
monumentConfigurations.description: Enables the spawning of recyclers at the Stables.

monumentConfigurations.name: cargoship_recycler
monumentConfigurations.description: Enables the spawning of recyclers at the Cargoship.
